ygData.subject: Re: Ivandyr's hoop?
ygData.msgSnippet: give her a ruby and pray. its a random chance you ll get the hoop. ... From: ken satchell flash-net & nikken distrubter  To:

give her a ruby and pray. its a random chance you'll get the hoop.
